item.title: Beef prices hit record highs as nationwide cattle inventory drops to lowest level in 70 years
item.description: Beef prices are at record highs as drought reduced cattle inventory to the lowest levels since 1951, with ground beef up 12.8% and steak prices rising...

item.title: New car down payments hit 4-year low as buyers struggle with affordability challenges
item.description: Down payments for new vehicles dropped to a nearly four-year low, but car shoppers still struggle with affordability as high monthly payments persist,...

item.title: American Airlines jet cancels takeoff after LAX runway incursion
item.description: American Airlines flight 2453 from LAX to Boston aborted takeoff Sunday night after another aircraft crossed the runway without authorization.
